tuv.seg: • Issues to be considered
• Saincheisteanna a bhfuil breithniú le déanamh orthu
In July 2016, the Oireachtas passed a resolution to establish a Citizens’ Assembly which is to consider a limited number of issues
In Iúil 2016, rith an tOireachtas rún chun Tionól na Saoránach a bhunú a bhfuil breithniú le déanamh aige ar líon teoranta saincheisteanna
The Assembly has a time limit of one year from the date of the first Assembly meeting for completion of its work
Leagtar teorainn ama bliain amháin ar an Tionól ó dháta chéad chruinniú an Tionóil chun a chuid oibre a thabhairt chun críche
It held its first meeting in October 2016
Tá súil leis go dtionólfar a chéad chruinniú i nDeireadh Fómhair 2016
The Assembly comprises a chairperson appointed by the Government and 99 citizens entitled to vote in referenda who were selected so as to be broadly representative of Irish society

Is éard a bheidh sa Tionól ná cathaoirleach a cheapann an Rialtas agus 99 saoránach atá i dteideal vóta a chaitheamh i reifrinn a roghnófar d’fhonn ionadaíocht fhairsing a dhéanamh do shochaí na hÉireann
Substitutes can be appointed who are entitled to contribute to the proceedings and vote in their own name
Féadtar comhaltaí ionaid a cheapadh a bheidh i dteideal cur leis na himeachtaí agus vóta a chaitheamh ina n-ainm féin
The Assembly agrees its own rules of procedure for the conduct of its business
Comhaontóidh an Tionól ar a rialacha féin nós imeachta chun tabhairt faoina ghnó
The Assembly may invite and accept submissions from interested parties and can seek such expert advice as it considers desirable
Féadfaidh an Tionól cuireadh a thabhairt d’aighneachtaí agus glacadh leo a fhaightear ó pháirtithe ar spéis leo agus an chomhairle shaineolach sin a lorg a mheasann sé is inmhianaithe
An expert advisory group assists the work of the Assembly
Cabhróidh grúpa saineolach comhairleach le hobair an Tionóil
All matters before the Assembly are to be determined by a majority vote of the members present and voting, other than the chairperson
Tá cinneadh le déanamh ar gach ceist a bhíonn os comhair an Tionóil trí vóta tromlaigh na gcomhaltaí atá i láthair agus a chaitheann vóta, seachas vóta an chathaoirligh
The chairman has a casting vote if the vote is tied
Tá vóta réitigh ag an gcathaoirleach má bhaintear comhionannas vótaí amach
Issues to be considered
Saincheisteanna a bhfuil breithniú le déanamh orthu
The issues the Assembly have being asked to consider are:
Is iad na saincheisteanna a iarrtar ar an Tionól breithniú a dhéanamh orthu:
• The Eighth Amendment of the Constitution
• An tOchtú Leasú ar an mBunreacht
• How we best respond to the challenges and opportunities of an ageing population
• Conas is fearr a fhreagraímid do na dúshláin agus na deiseanna a chruthaíonn daonra atá ag dul in aois
• The manner in which referenda are held
• An bealach ina gcuirtear reifrinn ar bun
• How the State can make Ireland a leader in tackling climate change
• Conas is féidir leis an Stát ceannaire a dhéanamh d’Éirinn i ndul i ngleic le hathrú aeráide
The first issue to be discussed is the Eighth Amendment of the Constitution
Is é an chéad cheist atá le plé an tOchtú Leasú ar an mBunreacht
The Assembly may also be asked to consider other matters
Chomh maith leis sin, féadtar iarraidh ar an Tionól breithniú a dhéanamh ar cheisteanna eile
The Assembly will report and make recommendations to the Houses of the Oireachtas on each issue as soon as it has completed its deliberations on it
Déantar an Tionól tuairisciú agus moltaí a chur ar fáil do Thithe an Oireachtais maidir le gach saincheist a luaithe a thug se a phlé ar an tsaincheist chun críche
